machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma
;Contact: contact-pro@dagoma3d.com

;Sliced: {date} {time}

;Estimated print time: {print_time}

;Print speed: {speed_print}mm/s
;Layer height: {layer_height}mm
;Wall thickness: {wall_thickness}mm
;Infill density: {infill_sparse_density}%
;Infill pattern: {infill_pattern}
;Support: {support_enable}
;Print temperature: {material_print_temperature}Â°
;Flow: {material_flow}%
;Retraction amount: {retraction_amount}mm
;Retraction speed: {retraction_retract_speed}mm/s

G21 ;Set units to millimeters
G90 ;Set all axes to absolute
M140 S{material_bed_temperature} ;Preheat hotbed
M117 Nozzle preheating ;Set message
M109 R{material_standby_temperature} ;Preheat hotend before bed leveling
M117 Hotbed preheating ;Set message
M190 S{material_bed_temperature} ;Preheat hotbed before bed leveling
G28 ;Go to origin on all axes
G29 ; Bed Leveling
G0 X215 Y1 Z0.4 ;Move XYZ axis before purge
M117 Wait for print temp ;Set message
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Wait for initial print temp
M83 ;Set E to relative positioning
G1 E{retraction_amount} F200 ;Purge
G0 Z3 ;Move Z axis before print start
M82 ;Set E to absolute positioning
G92 E0 ;Set E position
G1 F{travel_speed} ;Set the feedrate to {travel_speed}mm/s
M117 Print in progress ;Set message

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma

M104 S0 ;Set hotend temperature for cooldown
M140 S0 ;Set hotbed temperature for cooldown
G91 ;Set all axes to relative
G0 Z+3 ;Move Z axis after print end
G1 E-{retraction_amount} F5000 ;Retract filament to stop oozing
G90 ;Set all axes to absolute
G28 X Y ;Home the X and Y axes
M18 ;Disable steppers motors
M117 Print end ;Set message
